quote: Work as though you would live forever, and live as though you would die today. Go another mile. – Og Mandino
fact: The fingerprints of koala bears are virtually indistinguishable from those of humans, so much so that they can be easily confused at a crime scene.
joke: Last night me and my girlfriend watched three DVDs back to back. Luckily I was the one facing the TV.
